column1: Advanced Electrical and Electronic Engineering with Extended Research MSc
column3: Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering
column5: The first year of this advanced MSc programme aims to provide you with a Master's level knowledge in Electrical and Electronic Engineering by providing you with a wide range of optional modules in order to suit your background, interest and career aspirations.In the second year, you will apply the knowledge and skills acquired to solve contemporary real world problems in an extended year long research project, and aims to further enhance your knowledge and skills base in order to boost your prospect of employment as a professional engineer in this field.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
